, better known as Santo Amaro, is a small city in
Take a Cisne Branco bus from

heading to Barreirinhas. Ask the driver to let you off at Sangue. The bus costs R$21 and takes about 3 hours. In Sangue, 4X4 (called "Toyotas") meet the buses to go to Santo Amaro. They charge R$15 and the trip takes about 2 hours.

value: is a nice lagoon within walking distance from the town. Ask the locals how to get there.
Take a tour further into the dunes. This must be done with a guide. Everyone in town who isn't a guide knows one. You can walk all the way across the park to
, stopping on the way at some small communities within the park. This takes three days. If you have less time, you can just walk to the community of

There is internet at the high school at the main square. Slow as molasses.
